ClassDesc: A http:##developer#android#com@B_java#util#Map_E@ that notifies when items change. This kind of Map may be data bound and have the UI update as the map changes. Implementers must call @B_android#databinding#ObservableMap#OnMapChangedCallback#onMapChanged_E@ whenever an item is added, changed, or removed. ObservableArrayMap is a convenient implementation of ObservableMap. MapChangeRegistry may help other implementations manage the callbacks.
